Reviews.Content: I almost like this better than my Kindle for reading books -- and my children love my Kindle for playing games!

Reviews.Title: Quality issues
Reviews.Author: Stephen D. Jones
Reviews.Content: USB charge port failed in 3 weeks-loose internal hardware. Thank goodness for Square Trade allowing for a refund. I believe Dell could do a better job with manufacturing standards-although  the price point for this device is on the lower end. Hard to recommend given the concern for longevity and performance. I would recommend paying a little more for better quality devices.

Reviews.Title: fun to usw
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy the ease of use and it is easy for my daughter to use. Using the tablet has really become fun to use when playing games or watching tv.

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: Bob "Robert Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: Should have HDMI and 4G to make it Great...Like the small form for traveling. Still testing it to see how useful it is.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7
Reviews.Author: Teresa Higashi
Reviews.Content: I like it, it holds a 64 sd card inside.. I like that. The only thing I don't like is no instructions, although dell on the phone has been great. What they do not say is that it comes with very few apps. You have to download the apps you want from the play store. They say it eliminates having a bunch of apps you do not want on it.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue & - 16 GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Trekkie71
Reviews.Content: To start off, I love this tablet. It has a good amount of memory, and a microSDHC slot for more memory. The color and clarity of the screen is great, easy to use buttons. My only complaint I have, is that the plug-in to charge is on the bottom of the tablet, so if you are trying to use it in a case (standing), the cord is in the way, otherwise I'd give this 5 stars. The price was decent. I bought the i-UniK Slim Folio Dell Venue 7 Android 7 inch Tablet Protection Case with Bonus Stylus to go with it. Overall, it's a good tablet for the money, and I will probably buy this product again.This is an add on to my review from several months ago.I do have another issue with this tablet. The camera takes crappy photos/videos. Quite pointless to even try it, since there are not a lot of options to modify the camera settings. Unless someone can tell me what I'm not doing right?

Reviews.Title: fast and good graphics
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Love it have not had it long enough to figure out all the functions it does what I expected it to do . For me it's a new learning curve on how to use the android system. getting apps is a curve for me I cannot figure out how to cancel pages searched the net nothing shows up so still have a long way to go.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this product
Reviews.Author: Francisco M.
Reviews.Content: Well, until now this product is working well for me. It is a recognized mark and with good price.It has more features than another tablets more expensive and with less features like the storage space.That's the reason beacause I advise to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Good little tablet
Reviews.Author: Darcy L. Hamm
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my husband after one of our friends bought one. He uses it every day and loves it. I've also used it on occasion and found it to be a good little tablet. It's fast, actually faster than my much higher priced big name brand tablet. I haven't found anything about this tablet to complain about. The price is great and it'll do pretty much anything you would want/expect a tablet to do. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: very nice...
Reviews.Author: kenneth markham
Reviews.Content: the graphics and nice...plug is a little hard to pull out after charging...but other than that....love it :) thank u to my dad for getting it for my daughter for christmas... thanks dad!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7
Reviews.Author: Hoops
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for the money . Very nice screen and color . Easy to use and set up . I like it so much thinking of getting the 8 inch also .

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7 16GB
Reviews.Author: Yuri Birfer
Reviews.Content: I bought this amazing tablet for my five year old daughter and she calls it iPad :) we'll she wouldn't know the difference any ways. When I got in the beginning of a last year for my oldest one 12 year old a real iPad mini my little one just kept on bugging her sister almost fighting every time so that she could use it and she did so I promised her that with her good behaviour Santa just might bring her one for Christmas so since the 25th of January my little one has never let it out of her site, she sleeps with it too. Me personally I have done many things on it such as setting it up installing games and etc. on Dell Venue and I was really amazed how slick and fast this tablet is having 2GB of Ram and 16 GB of storage it's more then enough  not only for a five year old but for my self as a back up to my iPad Air it does everything that you throw at it with ease, you tube videos and Netflix is pure enjoyment to watch on it never crashes or any problem what so ever.I would strongly recommend to anyone who is looking for a android tablet and wants safe money!DELL has never let me down even when I had my first laptop latitude about eight years agoLook no further and buy this well built and easy to use tablet, you won't regret it, and will remember my review I promise.

Reviews.Title: Great value, Geat Tablet..
Reviews.Author: OLIVER BACANI
Reviews.Content: This is the most affordable tablet so far in the market I found from a known brand. Performance is a breeze and specs are comparable to the top tier tablets available right now.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7 16 GB Tablet (Android)
Reviews.Author: Nole fan
Reviews.Content: We have a Motorola Razr smart phone with Android that made the familiarzation quite simple.  Battery power is very good.

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet, does what you want it to do. Recommend getting a micro SD card to increase storage. Not fancy but better then most of those cheapo tablets.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: tope
Reviews.Content: Nice size, works well, as advertised. Wish battery life was longer, gets about 4.5 hours off each charge. I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Dad loved it!!!
Reviews.Author: Lauren Pirrung
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my dad, and he loves it. It hasn't had any problems, it's the perfect size, and it has a great display. The camera quality isn't the best but that was expected. Love this tablet!!

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Peachperfection "Shoeholic"
Reviews.Content: Great gift item especially for someone who is constantly on the go.  It has 16GB of memory so there's a huge capacity for storing books, apps etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Xander
Reviews.Content: Dell seems to have resurrected itself into the modern era with new devices and is proving that a quality product does not have to be expensive. I cannot say anything bad about this tablet, it works as well as the others for much less. This really holds its own.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful piece of technology
Reviews.Author: FS529
Reviews.Content: I had an iPad mini once, then moved to Android with this Dell Venue 7 and I can tell that this was not a bad move. This device is flawless, I've owned it for about a month now and it runs smoothly, the design and manufacturing are totally perfect. Cherry on the top? I would say the 3MP camera: it's not professional, you look like an alien when you take pictures, but it's very handy and can take pretty good pictures.If you consider buying your first tablet, this is definitely a go.If you consider buying an inexpensive top quality tablet, this is what you are looking for.One big downside, just so you know: Android doesn't support Flash... Other than that it's just great!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: S. J. Hall "onesh"
Reviews.Content: First class delivery service, excellent speed at answering questions about delivery before Christmas time so the tablet arrived at the right place and in time.Dell tablet is a force to be reckoned with. Nexus / Google 7 has better watch out.​

Reviews.Title: Very much worth the price
Reviews.Author: Cathie Burkland
Reviews.Content: I have a blackberry playbook, but I'm kinda hooked on android so I finally decided to grab up an android tablet. I'm really only using it fit web browsing, social media & email -rather than turning on the computer or messing with my phone.Have had this 3 days now. Impressively thin & lightweight. Screen resolution is nice & sharp. Screen is responsive - darned near perfect (playbook's is crap.)Like that it has 2G operating RAM. Processor its nice & fast.I did not buy this for the camera -who does???Overall very pleased with performance. Great for the price & my uses. Great Dell guarantee. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: a must buy
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: Preforms above our expectations. Looks and sounds great.  Would give as a gift and recommend this to anyone. Even picks up our homes wifi in previously low.connection areas.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet!
Reviews.Author: StephanieLynn
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my Mom for Christmas. She loves it!! She learned how to use it very quickly. It the perfect size too. You can easily put it in your purse or bag. Its fast and user friendly. I definitely recommend this tablet. And at $150, its a super great deal!!

Reviews.Title: It's really fast, but..
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: It has some 'critical problem' of screen cracked.  I mean, not the physical screen, but graphic is often crashed while watching Youtube movie. unfortunately, had to return... but it was very fast and touch works well.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sharon Johnson
Reviews.Content: I feel that it gives a good quality picture for the price. I especially like the google feature that responds to your voice.

Reviews.Title: Dell Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Valerie Clingerman
Reviews.Content: We have been very pleased with the quality of this item.  We especially like having both  a front and rear facing camera on this.  The color and graphics are very clear.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7
Reviews.Author: Dr. Eason
Reviews.Content: Orginially, I am a HP junkie, but this Dell is working great for me.  I can't say enough good things about it.  I had wanted to get a tablet that had a dual camera on it but decided against it because I already have a great canon camera and an excellent camera on my Iphone4.  This is easy to use has lots of memory and gets the job done for me.  I would recommend it for college students and even professionals who want some simply yet have the capacity to store lots of info.  Besides, dell products are depenable and have great warranties.

Reviews.Title: Great table, great price
Reviews.Author: K. Sterling
Reviews.Content: I have recently started traveling to more conferences and I decided to buy a new tablet so that I could send email, read, and do all that sort of thing. I decided to buy the best cheapest tablet I could find and wound up getting the Dell Venue. This tablet is great. It is nice to surf the web, read/send email, read books, comic books, write the occasional document, video chat with my family and so on.Pros1) Inexpensive, powerful, light = really everything you want from a tablet2) Runs almost stock Android. This was a huge point for me. My Samsung G3 has a ton of bloatware that I cannot take off. The experience on stock Android is great.3) Does everything I want a tablet to do.Cons1) Front camera is weak. I hardly use it so this isn't an issue for me. It works great for video chats (I use Google Hangouts all the time)2) Battery life is only ok. I think I am getting 6 hours of use. I would like that to be higher but hard to complain about.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Erich Maria Remarque
Reviews.Content: Super speedy and not too bloated. It looks almost like stock Android 4.2. The screen feels very responsive and there is plenty of space (as a secondary tablet, and I haven't found the need to use the built in MicroSD card slot).This actually comes with an Intel Atom CPU so there is potential to actually put WIndows on this device.Price wise this is decent as well. Netflix is very smooth, and the sound is very loud with headphones on.I honestly can't think of any downsides. :)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Donna H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9 year old to use and love it!  His dad wants to take it over! He watches videos and plays games without any trouble. I was a little apprehensive to purchase an android system after using an iPad for the last several years. No trouble at all.  I am pleased!

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7 16 GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Darlene Atkinson
Reviews.Content: I love the clear picture, but it a little overy touchy and my apps change to quickly, that might be great for a 15 year age person, for meI like it not to be so touchy why 4 stars, I also love it cause I can climb into bed yet still go online. thank great product.

Reviews.Title: Great product and a great price
Reviews.Author: Jedd
Reviews.Content: My 6-year-old daughter lost her iPod touch so I decided to replace it with a 7" tablet. After shopping around, this looked like the best option. It was cheaper than buying another iPod, with a larger screen, expandable memory with the Micro SD slot and the same battery life. She loves the tablet and has no interest in another iPod touch. Great product from Dell!

Reviews.Title: Really great
Reviews.Author: Basil "A Work in Progress"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this is perfect.  The processing speed is good. I listen to jango and the music sounds very good. It is very bright at night so its good for night reading. Overall it is a great product and good buy. The negatives include the fact there are software that I will never use that keep updating. without the option to stop the auto updates s lot of storage will be sucked up.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Tisha Warren
Reviews.Content: Love Dell products. Have had 2 dell laptops in the family with no problems so bought a tablet for youngest son as a gift. He was completely surprised and loves it

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom and decided to keep it for my self. I love it so compact .

Reviews.Title: A Gift of the Future
Reviews.Author: David Alexander Smathers
Reviews.Content: We ordered Two for Grandchildren.  The are saying there approval.  This was a good choice for them.  We picked them for there reliability.  We looked for Ruggedness.  We looked for their leading to better school work.  Very nice presentation.  Read buyers review at Website.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Sandy Brown
Reviews.Content: My husband loved it he has not stop playing it since he opened it on Christmas Eve. The price was great.

Reviews.Title: Very good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Very good Tablet but battery life isn't very good.it runs very smooth without any lags.best tablet for its price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Dagny
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet, but the charger cord they sent with it only worked to charge it a few times, which was really irritating.I use the tablet daily for work, gaming, and other app use.  It works for everything I'd hoped it would.  I love the tablet.  I've recommended it to friends and family.  Their chargers all work fine, it was only mine that was faulty.  I wish there was a way to fix that.  The charge lasts a decent amount of time.  It is a tablet, so the camera isn't anything special.Overall it's an awesome tablet and I love it.  Great buy for my budget.  Given the choice (in my budget - I can't afford an ipad which was my first pick) I'd buy it again.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GREAT GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: LT2000
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. I was on the fence about getting a windows based tablet, but decided i would give the Jelly Bean tablet a shot. Was i sure surprised!!!! the apps available give me all the accessibility i need to remote access my office and do whatever i need to do (office, excel, project, even some low level CAD!!!). The 2GBRAM really makes a difference and this thing runs smoothly. I would really like to see it with the KitKat system, but for the price, you really cannot beat it. I was torn between this and a few other competitorss, but if computing is important, the extra RAM makes a WORLD of difference. BRAVO!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Andrew aeckman
Reviews.Content: Had the tablet 1 month and 100% satisfied. Cashed in on the Amazon Credit Card offer and saved $30. For a $100 tablet, I am blown away. Speed, battery life, ease of use - all 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: is ok
Reviews.Author: Lusa
Reviews.Content: the battery runs out faster than i thought of, and it takes a long to turn it on.but the overview was good!

Reviews.Title: Big things come in small packages
Reviews.Author: gr8ladysc
Reviews.Content: Small but powerful. I love how easy it is to navigate and use. Have not been disappointed with its performance...fast!

Reviews.Title: "GREAT LITTLE TABLET"
Reviews.Author: TRICKY
Reviews.Content: I LIKE THE COMPACT DESIGN. IT PLAYS GAMES GREAT AND IS FAST WHEN WEB SEARCHING. CHARGE WILL LAST ABOUT 5 HOURS WITH HEAVY GAMING. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TABLET BUT BUY A PROTECTIVE CASE FOR IT.

Reviews.Title: Great price and tablet
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I really like the tablet. It was a great price and it does the trick for what I need it for- mostly surfing the net. The only thing that I don't like is that it isn't compatible with Amazon Instant Video, which really sucks because I wanted to watch movies on it from Amazon.Overall, good purchase. Would recommend.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet around with the best price!!!
Reviews.Author: Karyn B.
Reviews.Content: Love this product.  This is actually the second one we have purchased. The first was for myself,  and the second was for my son. Their are many similar products out there obviously,  however this one has a larger memory capability, faster processor, and was much cheaper!  I don't know why you would chose anything else!!

Reviews.Title: For the money, it's very good
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Biernbaum "Researcher and Psychologist"
Reviews.Content: The Dell Venue 7 looks like most of the chinese tablets coming out these days - it is indeed made in China.  The specs are really excellent for a tablet that is less than 140$.  Good speed, decent multitasking.  Nice touch screen.  The speaker is actually pretty good.  I've had a glitch or two, but mostly no problems at all and have been using it daily for a month.  Great size when you are on the go.  The HD screen is very nice quality.

Reviews.Title: its the best tablet ive used so far
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Reneau
Reviews.Content: I love it. I only wish I could afford the one with more ram and storage. I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the buck
Reviews.Author: Stacy Blest
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my new tablet. Very sharp picture...great for watching movies on. I also love the long battery life it has.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the money
Reviews.Author: Jerome King
Reviews.Content: Worth the money. very compact and processing speed is decent. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Neat tab
Reviews.Author: T. Crane "thatguynatl"
Reviews.Content: neat tablet, but very lacking in the battery performance area.  Not as impressed with Dell's support of their tablet products as with their standard fare.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: reginald hathaway
Reviews.Content: Have had no problems with this tablet.  Runs great and looks great too. good value for the price!!  hard to keep away from my son

Reviews.Title: Very capable tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Micbax77
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for about 3 weeks now and I can honestly say that I am completely satisfied. It runs very smooth as far as watching videos on YouTube or Netflix, and it actually handles 3D graphics quite well for only having a dual core processor. As soon as I received it and connected to WiFi there was a notification for a system update to android 4.3 which went off without a hitch. I have tried numerous apps and have yet to encounter any problems. I ran the AnTuTu benchmark test and it scored 19126. If you don't want to or can't afford to spend $230 on a nexus 7 I think you would find this to be a very capable alternative.

Reviews.Title: Loving It
Reviews.Author: Viveca Ronelle Allen
Reviews.Content: I've enjoyed my new tablet. I bought this one to replace my Kindle Fire (2013) and it has suited my needs well. I didn't need all the bells and whistles that higher-end tablets have...just needed something of great quality for a great price. This Dell Venue 7 allows me to expand my memory with its handy SD slot (currently have a 64G microSD)...I have no complaints so far!!

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Edward Hurst
Reviews.Content: The specs are rather good for the money and I've always had good luck with Dells. Gave this to my wife as a gift for travel use.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue ~ great value
Reviews.Author: S. Mclaughlin "tennis53"
Reviews.Content: Having had an inexpensive generic tablet, I am very pleased with the responsiveness in the Dell Venue.  It does everything it's more expensive sister tablets do at a fraction of the cost.  Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Fastner "monkeyboy"
Reviews.Content: My technologically challenged wife streams her Vietnamese TV series and music with her Venue and uses it every day since I bought it for her in December. It was a good deal at $149. I'd give it more stars if it had broadband but then it would have cost much more.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Esteban
Reviews.Content: Works Ok, Screen its perfect, battery life is very good, better than a crappy ipad.. it's dell always with really good products!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This replaces a 10" tablet that had 1gb mem. This one is smaller but I actually like the size better than the 10". The screen is clear and easy to read. The speed of the tablet is great for my uses. Mainly I want something to do some quick email reading and surfing the internet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Torry rice
Reviews.Content: Great tablet! Easy to use, lots of good features as well. Would recommend this as a gift for any one

Reviews.Title: Enjoyable device for around the house
Reviews.Author: Christine Barrows
Reviews.Content: I bought a Dell Venue 7 a few months ago, and so far, I'm really enjoying it. I use it around the house for a variety of things. I like bringing it into the kitchen for reading recipes online while I'm cooking and baking. Takes up much less space that plopping my big laptop on the counter. I frequently use it as a controller for my Chromecast, and for playing games on the couch while I'm having lazy days. I find the camera to be underwhelming, but it is usable under the right light conditions.  It's small and light enough for me to carry in my purse without adding too much bulk. Ultimately, it's a great companion device, and I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Dell tablet
Reviews.Author: Babygirl45
Reviews.Content: The tablet was good but the charger doesn't work. I would recommend it for kids 12 and under and may a beginner.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is very good.
Reviews.Author: Jose Vicente Ruiz
Reviews.Content: I chose this because I have a tablet not as big size, good 2GHz processor, Android 4.2.2 OS, 2 GB RAM and only for $ 149.99. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Aside from it's WIFI receptor....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I wanted one mainly to travel. Carrying along my mac book was becoming too heavy. The first one I ordered was a second hand that I had to return as the screen would freeze. So with less than 15 dollars more I ordered a new one. I've been playing with it for the last 3 weeks and I'm happy with it. In terms of speed, visuals and size. The down side is that the WIFI receptor is not the best, as it can't get the sign when I'm at the garden (where my mac has no problems), and the other down side is the speakers which don't produce the best sound and it has a low volume in general. But this is not an obstacle for me, so I might get some speakers.

Reviews.Title: Really like this tablet
Reviews.Author: corpt "TC"
Reviews.Content: would have rated it higher,if was compatible with a specific app I need for work,like that it has a clean version of android

Reviews.Title: Glued to my Hand...
Reviews.Author: Toddy
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something that i could take with me on certain Outing in which by i seen this awesome Device that is light weight and  is easy to take pics or videos of Places & or Events that i travel to where ever i may go. I also like the Idea i can get on Facebook, check my online Account or track a Package at the swipe of the Finger.

Reviews.Title: New Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sam Grove
Reviews.Content: Does everything I want it to so far.  I'm very pleased with it.  I would recommend it for any one else.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery Life
Reviews.Author: William E. Rogers
Reviews.Content: If you are ,looking for a tablet that can maintain battery life, then this is NOT the tablet for you.

Reviews.Title: Tablet is very good, I like it.
Reviews.Author: Joel6960
Reviews.Content: I like that one I just upgrade your OS is also being fast, I see no slowness or latency in it. It's for my father, he plays a lot of facebook games and others. Does the job, the consumption of multimedia content.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave this product a 4-star rating because I think it is a super tablet. I have only otherwise used an iPad, so I don't have much basis to compare to other tablets. But it does everything I wanted it to, and more. The only reason I did not give it a 5-star rating is the battery life between charges has diminished quite a bit. It is rated at 6-10 hours, I probably started at 6 hours, and am now down to about 4 hours. I attribute that to having downloaded more and more apps, but am not sure.

Reviews.Title: Dell Venue 7
Reviews.Author: Marrielle
Reviews.Content: Dell makes a very bad product with this. Never had a bad Dell PC or Laptop. The tablet overheats after 20 minutes of continuous use. Keyboard freezes up, pages freeze, tablet blacks out. This was less than 60 days out of the box. Amazon was no help. Threw me to Dell. Dell would only replace it with a Refurbished Tablet. Disappointed? No. ANGRY !!!!. had to take refurbished unit. SAME PROBLEMS RIGHT AWAY!Bought a Google  Nexus 7 2nd Generation to use. It has the very same overheating then keyboard problems!I switch between the two. Very bad experience x 2 !!

Reviews.Title: Can't root it so it's no good to me
Reviews.Author: Angelo Felix
Reviews.Content: Dell is hell-bent on blocking root attempts on their tablets. Every time developers create a root-hack, Dell proceeds to block it with their obligatory "updates".I guess the way Dell sees it is, the tablet belongs to Dell, even though you paid for it.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: yulimir "YULIMIR MANZANARES"
Reviews.Content: goodexcellentvery good materialI recommend itI like his responsibilityThey are attentiverecommend the truthgoodgood

Reviews.Title: venue 7 -display dim, netflix resolution
Reviews.Author: Mitchell B. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have not used my new dell venue 7 that much yet, but I have not encountered any significant tissues. A few things: I did find the display a little dim, and another review found that the display was significantly duller (less lux output) than many other tablets, including the asus memo pad hd 7. I found that the display resulting from various youtube videos were sharp and clear, with good resolution, but I found that several netlfix films, tv shows, seemed to have lower resolution and a lot of "jaggies." Is that because the netflix ap in 4.2.2 is only in sd, not HD? Or does it depend on the content? I also found that text in general had a lot of aliasing (jaggies). Will the above improve with android 4.3 or 4.4? Is there any likelihood that Dell will make these available to the venue 7 soon?

Reviews.Title: returning this
Reviews.Author: Kao Yian Saeteurn
Reviews.Content: This item looks like a well made tablet, however when you start to download programs from the play store, this tablet cant seem to handle apps. Most of the apps just froze and had to system shut down. I am returning this tablet.Would not recommend this at all.Now I have the apple mini and love this. The extra cost is definitely worth it!

Reviews.Title: I hope! I researched all tablets & read all reviews. Dell Venue 7 seems to be the winner!
Reviews.Author: Bex
Reviews.Content: Dell is the answer to low cost tablets!!! B&N; really upset me over blocking buying games, etc. except from Google Play or their Playstore. I was told when I bought the Nook HD that I could download ANY android apps except for those that say "for Kindle". I hate "Google everything". Did you know that if you use Google Play the game manufactures and who else knows is privy to ALL of your info, including your credit card on Nook as well as the security code. I confronted B&N; about these lies, and even though I've had my Nook for over 3 months they are refunding every dime I paid for the Nook, the cover, the books & games & even a $25.00 B&N; gift card I got for Christmas. I can't wait to get the Dell Venue 7. I went straight to Dell.com & a chat popped up. I asked them everything I could think to ask. They said the Venue 7 is the best Dell tablet out there & You CAN by android apps from Amazon or anywhere else without being blocked or having your info shared! The reviews of all other tablets in the $200.00 or less price range really fail in comparison to the Dell Venue 7. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Imtiaz Jamil
Reviews.Content: Nothing much to say. You get what you pay for. I'd probably recommend it people in a tight budget. The only con: The screen is pretty bad.
